text: I'm really excited for today's recipe
it's a bungee ice cream cake the only
cooking required is making this hot
fudge sauce that I'm making now and then
everything else is assembly you're not
going to believe how delicious one of my
personal favorite recipes I just added a

pot and I'm gonna add a quarter cup of
heavy cream to that to that add
two-thirds of a cup of granulated sugar
everything's just going to go in this
pot together all at once four
tablespoons of unsalted butter half cup
of unsweetened cocoa powder and then
just a pinch of salt and that's it
that's your sauce ingredients you just
want to bring it to a boil whisking
until everything is combined and melted
together basically just trying to
dissolve the sugar here because
granulated sugar is granulated which
means it's kind of crunchy right until
it melts and then it gets liquidy once
the mixture comes to a boil it's done
you just need to let it cool down
because you're gonna be layering this
with ice cream right so you don't want
it to be too hot when you're doing that
make sure you whisk while this is
happening otherwise the stuff that's on
the bottom will burn and you'll have
disgusting burnt chocolate flavor
instead of delicious hot fudge flavor
and now I'm just gonna turn it off let
it cool down before I start assembling

had time to cool I'm ready to assemble

that as this sits in the freezer the
graham crackers soften up and turned

minutes before you do another layer so
you're going to repeat this process
